p: The proximate composition of the finished products (VHC1, VHC2) was assessed according to ISO Methods: moisture SR ISO 1442:2010, protein SR ISO 937:2007; total lipid SR ISO 1443:2008; mineral substances SR ISO 936:2009, sugar SR ISO 91-2007, and fiber according ISO 13906: 2007; with FOOS Fibertec 2010&M6, Sweden. The carbohydrate content (%) was calculated as the difference between 100 and the sum of the following fractions: lipids, proteins, ash, fiber, and moisture.
